description:
The MerinoLoft™ Vest is a super-versatile layering piece filled with icebreaker’s innovative MerinoLoft insulation that adds a solid dose of core warmth to any outdoor adventure. The vest’s woven cotton shell features a durable, PFC-free water-repellent finish to shed moisture, while merino lining and merino wool Terry fabric on the sides help regulate body temperature. Offset shoulder seams reduce friction and front hand pockets secure small essentials.

Three layers of comfort in a lightweight layer, Icebreaker MerinoLoft™ has a durable, water-repellent shell filled with natural merino-fiber batting, with a super-soft lining in 100% merino. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker MerinoLoft Vest - Mens

specs.value: 88% Merino Wool, 12% Polylactide Exclusive Of Decoration
